mainText: in the morning, i heard the terrible news. steven jobs,our dear friend and an amazing genius, closed his eyes forever. it is really heartbreaking. i live in China and i have never been in America  even i have never bought any product of APPLE. but i am a fan of steve jobs  for his talent, courage and his nice smile. He lives in my heart. i will never forget him. Thank you, steve!
author: Anonymous
